review: Love the Amazon Fire TV. Was going to buy the fire stick, but since it was out of stock until 1/15/15, I went for the Fire TV. So glad I made this choice. After talking with some techy friends, they told me to go for this and put up the extra $60.00. Well worth it!!! I was also once a Roku user, and I do love Roku, but I would pick Fire TV over Roku any day. You can play games with the remote or you can buy a controller for the Fire TV. You cannot access all games with the remote, but they do offer a nice selection for the remote. you can access tons of amazon instant videos, Hulu, Netflix and more. I love my Fire TV :)
